channel.title: [711] Adding Fight Zones
channel.description: I was wondering if there was any tutorials for making 711 attack zones because i want to add an attack zone to free for all safe pk at clan wars any help?

item.title: [711] Adding Fight Zones
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

This might be able to help you.

public boolean inFightPits() { if (getLocation().getX() >= 2375 && getLocation().getX() <= 2418 && getLocation().getY() >= 5130 && getLocation().getY() <= 5167) { return true; } if ((getLocation().getX() >= 2381 && getLocation().getX() <= 2413 && getLocation().getY() >= 5131 && getLocation().getY() <= 5166)) { return true; }

So for what you’re trying to do it’ll be something like this:

public boolean inPvpZone() { if (getLocation().getX() >= 0 && getLocation().getX() <= 0 && getLocation().getY() >= 0 && getLocation().getY() <= 0) { return true; } if ((getLocation().getX() >= 0 && getLocation().getX() <= 0 && getLocation().getY() >= 0 && getLocation().getY() <= 0)) { return true; }

Read full topic
